1593 typedef struct RAIL_CsmaConfig {
1597  uint8_t csmaMinBoExp;
1601  uint8_t csmaMaxBoExp;
1607  uint8_t csmaTries;
1612  int8_t ccaThreshold;
1620  uint16_t ccaBackoff;
1624  uint16_t ccaDuration;
1630  RAIL_Time_t csmaTimeout;
1631 } RAIL_CsmaConfig_t;
1632 
1638 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_802_15_4_2003_2p4_GHz_OQPSK_CSMA { \
1639  /* CSMA per 802.15.4-2003 on 2.4 GHz OSPSK, commonly used by ZigBee */ \
1640  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 3, /* 2^3-1 for 0..7 backoffs on 1st try */ \
1641  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 5, /* 2^5-1 for 0..31 backoffs on 3rd+ tries */ \
1642  /* csmaTries */ 5, /* 5 tries overall (4 re-tries) */ \
1643  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* 10 dB above sensitivity */ \
1644  /* ccaBackoff */ 320, /* 20 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
1645  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* 8 symbols at 16 us/symbol */ \
1646  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
1647 }
1648 
1656 #define RAIL_CSMA_CONFIG_SINGLE_CCA { \
1657  /* Perform a single CCA after 'fixed' delay */ \
1658  /* csmaMinBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
1659  /* csmaMaxBoExp */ 0, /* Used for fixed backoff */ \
1660  /* csmaTries */ 1, /* Single try */ \
1661  /* ccaThreshold */ -75, /* Override if not desired choice */ \
1662  /* ccaBackoff */ 0, /* No backoff (override with fixed value) */ \
1663  /* ccaDuration */ 128, /* Override if not desired length */ \
1664  /* csmaTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout */ \
1665 }
1666 
1671 typedef struct RAIL_LbtConfig {
1675  uint8_t lbtMinBoRand;
1679  uint8_t lbtMaxBoRand;
1685  uint8_t lbtTries;
1690  int8_t lbtThreshold;
1698  uint16_t lbtBackoff;
1702  uint16_t lbtDuration;
1710  RAIL_Time_t lbtTimeout;
1711 } RAIL_LbtConfig_t;
1712 
1720 #define RAIL_LBT_CONFIG_ETSI_EN_300_220_1_V2_4_1 { \
1721  /* LBT per ETSI 300 220-1 V2.4.1 */ \
1722  /* LBT time = random backoff of 0-5ms in .5ms increments plus 5ms fixed */ \
1723  /* lbtMinBoRand */ 0, /* */ \
1724  /* lbtMaxBoRand */ 10, /* */ \
1725  /* lbtTries */ RAIL_MAX_LBT_TRIES, /* the maximum supported */ \
1726  /* lbtThreshold */ -87, /* */ \
1727  /* lbtBackoff */ 500, /* 0.5 ms */ \
1728  /* lbtDuration */ 5000, /* 5 ms */ \
1729  /* lbtTimeout */ 0, /* no timeout (recommend user override) */ \
1730 }
